title: SOLD: Chief Bender Portrait SGC30 - Piedmont 150

posts.post_title: SOLD: Chief Bender Portrait SGC30 - Piedmont 150
posts.post_content:
Monitor glare not included.

Note, back good aside from staining, front there is a small chip on his shoulder visible in the pictures.  

$old delivered in the USA.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eGzFgTsl.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LmpNFFml.jpg[/IMG]
Open to trades as well.  Interested in pre-war Philadelphia, I'm good on T206s, but, would listen otherwise.

I'll buy it, let me know your preferred payment.
Jim
I received the card, very nice, thanks.
